text: Pas, cun manosiki [hacci] xudro ʙa coj ovarded, hamon guna, ki padaronatonro [ʙo faxru ƣurur] jod mekarded, ʙalki [ʙehtar va] ʙestar az on Allohro jod kuned; va ʙarxe az mardum [kofirone] hastand, ki megujand: "Parvardigoro, ʙa mo dar dunjo [molu farzand] ato kun". In saxs dar oxirat ʙahrae [az ne'mathoi ilohi] nadorad
